text: Kru Jisasɨŋ nuŋandɨ miku ŋɨnɨŋɨndu kumañɨ tamami hama Judas, ŋgahi Jisasɨŋ ŋgatɨŋgɨruta pɨmɨ ŋgumu. Kamatɨhu nuŋandɨ indarɨmit hambu tɨvɨrami. Kamatɨhi 30 tɨmbahɨrɨs silva nuŋ Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhundu aru miku haŋɨnɨŋ naŋga Israel hatindu miku haŋɨnɨŋ ŋgumu haŋandɨhin, nurɨ kɨyɨmuyɨ aŋga mɨŋata umi.
